resources.string: This TextView supports Multiple Links. If you want to use it, you can add link text between <l> </l> tags. Texts between these tags are converted into links. For example <l> Facebook </l>, <l> Twitter </l>, <l> Linkedin </l> The click action is sent to the click listener with the link position number. You can switch by link position. For example if(linkPosition ==0) openFacebook()
